metadata.name: Methacholine Chloride USP 0 2 Powder for solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: It is most commonly used for diagnosing bronchial hyperreactivity using the bronchial challenge test

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Methacholine acts as a non selective muscarinic receptor agonist to stimulate the parasympathetic nervous system It is highly active at all of the muscarinic receptors

incompatibilities.description: Esmolol may increase the bronchoconstrictory activities of Methacholine
